title: Pacific hitchhike
creator_credit: Central Office of Information, Films of Fact and Peter Hennessy
brief_description: A World War II correspondant travels by a R.N. destroyer to join an aircraft carrier near the Admiralty Islands in the Pacific. Shows the transferring between moving ships, of men, mail and stores. Includes scenes of a 100 mph tornado, and shots of planes hiking and landing back onto the deck of the carrier. Photographs by Peter Hennessy.
